title: Jehoshaphat’s Righteous Reign
summary: Jehoshaphat becomes king of Judah and walks in the ways of the Lord. He strengthens Judah spiritually and militarily and sends teachers throughout the land to instruct the people in God’s Law.

faq.question: How did Jehoshaphat help the people spiritually?
faq.answer: He sent officials and Levites to teach the Book of the Law throughout Judah.

faq.question: What effect did this have on other nations?
faq.answer: Fear of the Lord fell on neighboring nations, and they avoided attacking Judah.
